title: My Reluctant Shifter Match
description: Four best friend and ex-special forces shifters contact the Love Bites Dating Agency, each for different reasons. One for love, one to forget, one on a dare, and one by mistake. This is Wells' story, the one who joined as a mistake.Wells Fernet just got out of the military after serving for over a decade. He’s been enjoying learning how to live a normal life out in the woods with his three best friends, but something about seeing two of his friends settled down, has him feeling like he’s missing out on something.They suggest that he use the Love Bites Dating Agency to find his fated mate too, and it has him intrigued.There’s just one problem.He’s old school and doesn’t believe in dating agencies, even if his friends have both had success.One drunken night with his friends where they show him the website and he accidently signs up.When the agency contacts him with his match, he doesn’t even remember signing up. When they inform him that they’ve already sent his mate his address and she’s on her way, he freaks out.He’s all set to turn her away as soon as she shows up but as soon as he hears Magnolia’s sweet southern voice, he knows that she’s it. She’s his fated mate and he doesn’t care if it all started as a mistake.This alpha shifter might be reluctant at first but all of that changes as soon as he smells his fated mate. Now nothing is going to get in the way of him making her his. Not if he has anything to say about it.
author: Skye Alder
